price: a vi ne možete ništa htjeti ako to Allah, Gospodar svjetova, neće!
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu rabbu al-ʿālamīna
